hero.title: The Next Evolution of Dogecoin
hero.subtitle: DOGE2.0 combines the beloved meme culture of Dogecoin with cutting-edge blockchain technology, offering staking rewards, eco-friendly mining, and a vibrant community-driven ecosystem.

features.title: Why Choose DOGE2.0?
features.subtitle: Built for the future with community at its heart

stakingRewards.title: Staking Rewards
stakingRewards.description: Earn passive income with our high-yield staking protocol. Lock your tokens and watch them grow.

ecoFriendly.title: Eco-Friendly
ecoFriendly.description: Proof of Stake consensus mechanism that's 99% more energy efficient than traditional mining.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Governed by the community, for the community. Every holder has a voice in our future.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.subtitle: Fair distribution designed for long-term growth

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Our journey to the moon and beyond

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about DOGE2.0

whatIs.question: What is DOGE2.0?
whatIs.answer: DOGE2.0 is the next evolution of the beloved Dogecoin, built on modern blockchain technology with enhanced features like staking, eco-friendly consensus, and community governance.

howToBuy.question: How can I buy DOGE2.0?
howToBuy.answer: You can buy DOGE2.0 through our website during the presale, or on supported exchanges once we go live. Make sure to use only official channels to avoid scams.

staking.question: How does staking work?
staking.answer: Staking allows you to lock your DOGE2.0 tokens and earn rewards. Simply connect your wallet to our staking platform, choose your staking period, and start earning passive income.

roadmap.question: What's on the roadmap?
roadmap.answer: Our roadmap includes launching the staking platform, getting listed on major exchanges, developing a mobile app, creating DeFi integrations, and building a complete ecosystem around DOGE2.0.

footer.description: Join the DOGE2.0 revolution and be part of the future of meme coins.
